subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Steve%20Hultay%20Files/Evp%20Maker%20Files/i_do_hear_you_get_awefully_hot.mp3

Regards,

urkel232002 <urkel23@...>
